definition: Roh Moo-hyun (1946-2009), South Korean lawyer and politician, president 2003-2008
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
stick-like implement inserted into the handles of a tripod cauldron in ancient times in order to lift the cauldron/commonly used in Korean names, transcribed as "hyun"

sentences.english: It was the third time that Roh has offered condolences since Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 這是週二以來盧武鉉第三次發表弔慰之辭。

sentences.english: But in the past decade it has weakened under the successive administrations of Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun.
sentences.chinese: 但在過去十年，在金大中和盧武鉉政府下遭到削弱。

sentences.english: Hu and Roh Moo-hyun also jointly met with journalists from the Chinese and ROK media.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤和盧武鉉還共同會見了中韓媒體記者。

sentences.english: 'When he was in office, I was sometimes disappointed at him, ' Ms. Park said.
sentences.chinese: 她說，當盧武鉉在臺上時，我有時對他感到失望。

sentences.english: Supporters of Mr. Roh issued news releases denouncing Mr. Lee and prosecutors.
sentences.chinese: 盧武鉉的支持者發表新聞稿指責李明博和檢察部門。

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun declared that the ROK acknowledges China's market economy status.
sentences.chinese: 盧武鉉宣佈韓國承認中國的市場經濟地位。

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun made highly positive comments on China's foreign policy of equality, mutual benefits and good-neighborliness towards neighboring countries.
sentences.chinese: 盧武鉉高度評價中國平等互利的睦鄰周邊外交政策。

sentences.english: The agreement, however, went missing during the Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun administrations.
sentences.chinese: 然而，該協議在金大中和盧武鉉政府期間丟失了。

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun and his wife stepped forward to extend cordial greetings to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 盧武鉉和夫人迎上前去，向他們致以親切問候。

sentences.english: People attend a funeral service for the former President Roh Moo-hyun at Roh's hometown Bonghwa village in Gimha.
sentences.chinese: 人們在前總統盧武鉉的家鄉慶尚峯下村參加他的葬禮。

sentences.english: Mr Roh , 62, was killed in a fall from a mountain near his home.
sentences.chinese: 盧武鉉今年62歲，從其家附近的一座山上墜落身亡。

sentences.english: Yet Mr Roh was also ill at ease with himself.
sentences.chinese: 而且盧武鉉自己真的也不太怡然自得。
